item.description:
Due to unforeseen personal circumstances, CPA Joe Craft, our planned speaker for Wednesday November 2nd, will not be able to attend.  We apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you and will let you know when Joe Craft  and his talk on Taxes will be rescheduled. 

_______________________________________________________________ In place of Joe Craft, our speakers for Wednesday, November 2nd, will be Rhiannon Trajlinek and Peter McHugh of Do Something Different, LLC.  They will be talking about effective marketing techniques for your social media marketing and website.  They spoke in April last year, and if you missed it, now is your chance to see them share their strategies and concepts on how to market your business in the new era of marketing.


TOPICS INCLUDE:

The Importance of Branding
Knowing Your Audience/Target Market
Catering Your Message to the Reader
Social Media Marketing
The Power of Using Multimedia
Balancing Personal and Professional Approaches

We hope to see you there at the Friendly REIA, the New England Real Estate Investors Association!


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door
 


Ask about getting YOUR membership today! 

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: New Marketing Strategies for Your Website and Social Media
